content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad Abbasi, let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Let's start with 500 euros per month.

[YourResponse]That's a bit high for an unfurnished apartment. I would suggest 350 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I can offer 400 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would accept 390 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: [YourResponse]I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not accepting any counter offer.
